trans-unit.source: Represents a column of cells that contain links in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en kolonne med celler som inneholder koblinger i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewLinkColumn class is a specialized type of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> class used to logically host cells that respond to user clicks.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DataGridViewLinkColumn er en spesiell den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>klassen som brukes som vert for logisk celler som svar til brukeren klikker.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewLinkColumn class is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn> class but provides a different user experience that may be more appropriate in certain situations, such as displaying a URL stored in a database table.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DataGridViewLinkColumn er lik den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn>klassen men gir en annen brukeropplevelse kan det være i enkelte situasjoner, for eksempel visning av en URL-adresse som er lagret i en tabell.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn>

trans-unit.source: To display the same link text for every cell, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A> property to `true` and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text%2A> property to the desired link text.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil vise samme koblingsteksten for hver celle, kan du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>egenskapen `true` og angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text%2A>til ønsket koblingsteksten.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: A DataGridViewLinkColumn has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell> in every <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> that intersects it.
trans-unit.target: En DataGridViewLinkColumn har en tilknyttet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>i hver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>som går gjennom det.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>

trans-unit.source: The default sort mode for this column type is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: Sorter standardmodus for denne kolonnetypen er <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>

trans-unit.source: To respond to user link clicks, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: For å svare på brukeren koblingen klikker, kan du behandle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName> event to respond to clicks anywhere in the cell.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName>-hendelsen for å svare på Klikk hvor som helst i cellen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: When initializing a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn> instance, this constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell> instance.
trans-unit.target: Under initialisering av en ny <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn>-forekomsten representerer denne konstruktøren angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A>egenskapen til en ny <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>forekomsten.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color used to display an active link within cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir fargen som brukes til å vise en aktiv kobling i cellene i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.ActiveLinkColor%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir denne egenskapen henter eller angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.ActiveLinkColor%2A>for objektet som returneres av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.ActiveLinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.ActiveLinkColor%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen også angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.ActiveLinkColor%2A>for hver celle i kolonnen og oppdateringer kolonnen vises.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.ActiveLinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil overstyre den angitte verdien for individuelle celler, kan du angi celleverdiene når du har angitt verdien i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color used to display a link that is being selected.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> som representerer fargene som brukes til å vise en kobling som blir merket.

trans-unit.source: The default value is the user's Internet Explorer setting for the color of links in the hover state.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er brukeren for Internet Explorer innstillingen for fargen på koblinger i tilstanden Hold pekeren.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir malen som brukes til å opprette nye celler.

trans-unit.source: The constructor for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn> class initializes this property to a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn>klassen initialiserer denne egenskapen til en nyopprettede <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Endre egenskaper for celle malen umiddelbart påvirker ikke brukergrensesnittet (UI) med kolonnens eksisterende celler.

trans-unit.source: These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).
trans-unit.target: Endringene er bare synlige når kolonnen genereres (for eksempel ved å sortere kolonnen eller via et kall til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> som alle celler i kolonnen er modellert etter.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en ny <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: When setting this property to a value that is not of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Når du setter denne egenskapen til en verdi som ikke er av typen <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this column.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en nøyaktig kopi av denne kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to duplicate a column of link cells.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden for å kopiere en kolonne med koble celler.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer det klonede <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the behavior of links within cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir virkemåten til koblinger i cellene i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkBehavior%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir denne egenskapen henter eller angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkBehavior%2A>for objektet som returneres av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkBehavior%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen også angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkBehavior%2A>for hver celle i kolonnen og oppdateringer kolonnen vises.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil overstyre den angitte verdien for individuelle celler, kan du angi celleverdiene når du har angitt verdien i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior"></xref> value indicating the link behavior.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior"> </xref> verdi som angir virkemåten koblingen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color used to display an unselected link within cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir fargen som brukes til å vise en umerket kobling i cellene i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkColor%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir denne egenskapen henter eller angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkColor%2A>for objektet som returneres av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkColor%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen også angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkColor%2A>for hver celle i kolonnen og oppdateringer kolonnen vises.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil overstyre den angitte verdien for individuelle celler, kan du angi celleverdiene når du har angitt verdien i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color used to initially display a link.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> som representerer fargene som brukes til å vise først en kobling.

trans-unit.source: The default value is the user's Internet Explorer setting for the link color.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er brukeren for Internet Explorer innstillingen for koblingsfarge for.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the link text displayed in a column's cells if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir koblingsteksten som vises i en kolonne celler Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue*>er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue*>

trans-unit.source: The text is visible if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Teksten er synlig hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, each cell's link text is populated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> property of each cell.
trans-unit.target: Ellers hver celle koblingsteksten er fylt med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>for hver celle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override the Text property value for individual cells by setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A> property to `false` after setting the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan overstyre egenskapen tekstverdien for individuelle celler ved å angi cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>egenskapen `false` når du har angitt kolonnen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the link text.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som inneholder koblingsteksten.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir denne egenskapen, verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: Henter en streng som beskriver kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som beskriver kolonnen.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the link changes color if it has been visited.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om koblingen endrer farge hvis den er fulgt.

trans-unit.source: When TrackVisitedState is true, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.VisitedLinkColor%2A> property value is used to display links that have already been visited.
trans-unit.target: Når TrackVisitedState er SANN, den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.VisitedLinkColor%2A>egenskapsverdien brukes til å vise koblinger som allerede er åpnet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.VisitedLinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.TrackVisitedState%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir denne egenskapen henter eller angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.TrackVisitedState%2A>for objektet som returneres av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.TrackVisitedState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.TrackVisitedState%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen også angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.TrackVisitedState%2A>for hver celle i kolonnen og oppdateringer kolonnen vises.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.TrackVisitedState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil overstyre den angitte verdien for individuelle celler, kan du angi celleverdiene når du har angitt verdien i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the link changes color when it is selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis koblingen endrer farge når den er merket. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text*> property value is displayed as the link text.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text*>egenskapsverdien vises som koblingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text*>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir denne egenskapen henter eller angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>for objektet som returneres av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen også angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>for hver celle i kolonnen og oppdateringer kolonnen vises.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil overstyre den angitte verdien for individuelle celler, kan du angi celleverdiene når du har angitt verdien i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text*> property value is displayed as the link text; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue*> property value is displayed as the link text.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <> </> *> egenskapsverdien vises som koblingstekst. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis cellen <> </> *> egenskapsverdien vises som koblingen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color used to display a link that has been previously visited.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir fargen som brukes til å vise en kobling som er fulgt tidligere.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.TrackVisitedState%2A> property is set to false, the VisitedLinkColor property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.TrackVisitedState%2A>er satt til USANN, VisitedLinkColor-egenskapen ignoreres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.TrackVisitedState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.VisitedLinkColor%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir denne egenskapen henter eller angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.VisitedLinkColor%2A>for objektet som returneres av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.VisitedLinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.VisitedLinkColor%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen også angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.VisitedLinkColor%2A>for hver celle i kolonnen og oppdateringer kolonnen vises.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.VisitedLinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil overstyre den angitte verdien for individuelle celler, kan du angi celleverdiene når du har angitt verdien i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color used to display a link that has been visited.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> som representerer fargene som brukes til å vise en kobling som har blitt åpnet.

trans-unit.source: The default value is the user's Internet Explorer setting for the visited link color.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er brukeren for Internet Explorer innstillingen for fargen besøkte koblingen.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
